name: PrimaxHelperRadar
0:
”Alexa, is the Helper Radar open?”
”Alexa, turn on Helper Radar Switch”
”Alexa, turn off Helper Radar Switch”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Primax provides solutions that allow you to receive notification when old people is fall down. Use Primax's skill to manage all your Primax devices. Simply enable the Primax Skill in the Alexa App and link your Alexa and Primax accounts to get started.

With a Primax Helper Radar, to checking the falling status from Primax Helper Radar. Simply say:
"Alexa, is the Helper Radar open?"

To control your device start/stop. Simply say:
"Alexa, turn on Helper Radar Switch"
"Alexa, turn off Helper Radar Switch"
